HEAVEN_1:
You were choisen
to complete your
civil duty.
HEAVEN_2:
Terrorist organization going by the name
'Chervnozorz'
occupied underground network
of Polotsk magnet mines.
HEAVEN_3:
Our intel tells us that
their goal lies in creating
a communist regime
in neighbouring territories.
HEAVEN_4:
By current date tens were killed,
around a hundred - wounded,
thousands - made into captives.
HEAVEN_5:
Chances for a successful
rescue mission are dwindling
every minute.
HEAVEN_6:
But, in your darkest hour
don't forget:
TUTORIAL_1: Practice is the best way for you to learn the basics.
TUTORIAL_2: Press Left SHIFT to enter a room to the right of your PARTY.
TUTORIAL_3: You were ambushed! Don't worry, you only command units, leave all the fighting for-...
TUTORIAL_6: As you can see, commanding FIGHTERS is done by pressing keyboard keys.
TUTORIAL_7: There are a lot of options, but you don't have to remember everything for now. Just don't forget to open manual if you get stuck.
TUTORIAL_8: Let's go back to the fight. Close the manual.
TUTORIAL_9: To win, you have to lower enemies' MORALE down to 0.
TUTORIAL_10: That can be achieved in multiple ways, but the most reliable one is causing TRAUMA to enemies.
TUTORIAL_11: Try to give ORDER to one of your fighters.
TUTORIAL_12: Every fighter has 3 orders to choose from. If you press S, the topmost order will be queued up.
TUTORIAL_FORCE_ACCELERATOR: Yes, you can switch orders with 'A' and 'D'. But right now it is best if you press 'S'.
TUTORIAL_13: Every order needs a target. Choose a target and press SPACE to execute all orders.
TUTORIAL_14: That's right! Now one of the enemy fighters is in GREAT PAIN, which will lower their morale. Just continue to attack and...
TUTORIAL_17: К нам поступила информация со штаба. Похоже, в шахтах скрывается не менее дюжины рептилий.
TUTORIAL_18: Существует риск того, что вы и ваши бойцы...уже 'поражены' рептилиями.
TUTORIAL_19: Однако без паники! Если вы все еще 'осознаете' мои слова, то не все потеряно. Вам всего лишь надо подтвердить ваше 'сознание'.
TUTORIAL_20: Для этого, закройте данное приложение и удалите его со своего устройства. Потеря нашей с вами связи будет знаком вашего здравия.
TUTORIAL_THREAT_1: Немедленно прекратите! Оставьте уничтожение рептилий бойцам Ассоциации Магов!
